title: Which gadgets do you use most often? - Quora

response.answer_text: I use the following :- Of course my phone, I use an iphone 6s plus, I use it for around 7–8 hours a day.My laptop, its an asus fx553vd i7 variant, I use it for coding, surfing and gaming. I use it for almost 6–7 hours a day.I use an apple watch series 2(42mm), I mostly use it to track my activities and for quick notifications as my phone is on silent mode most of the time. I use it when I am outside, so not much often.I use a bose headphone, because obviously who doesn’t want to get away from the world and immerse in the sweet world of music, quite often in fact very often.I use a Dualshock 4 controller, I play fifa, rivals, etc and playing on keyboard for these games is pain, not much often in a day though.

I use a lot of gadgets every day one of them being Alexa by amazon to control my hue lights in my house. Gadgets are awesome i found some articles for you to check out some really cool ones. Various Intriguing Gadgets That You Would Like To OwnMust Have Summer Gadgets
